phrases: This formula will show up on the test, so please remember it.
I will not lose to you on the upcoming midterms!
The one who will get first place is I, Tachibana Sylphynford!
Tachibana-san, we are in the middle of class...
Maybe it is because of the test next week,
I am not feeling very confident about our next test.
I made so many mistakes on the last one.
I make a lot of mistakes, too.
I even lost my student ID yesterday.
Maybe you just do not do well under pressure, Ebina-chan.
Just stay calm and you will do fine.
So let us both do our best.
If that is what you told her,
Aw, but that is such a pain.
You sure you should be playing some war game and not studying for your test?
Well, I guess it is okay.
Even if you do not study,
you always listen in class, so your grades are good.
Oh, but midterms do have a lot of trick questions.
It might be hard to get a good score just by going to class.
But I guess you cannot help that if you are just playing games before the test.
An FPS is not a game!
This is all your fault, Onii-chan!
They are totally going for a headshot!
They are not really that strong.
I am really not confident about this...
I am really not confident about this...
I am not confident about this.
I-I thought she was a youkai...
Youkai Umaru Nezumi: A youkai that falls on you in the night and clings.
If you give it snacks, it will go away.
Midterm Results 1. Doma Umaru 2. Tachibana Sylphynford
Umaru-chan, you are number one again.
Oh, it is just a coincidence.
And the tests were so hard!
Are you going to a good cram school?
And she is got a great figure, she is smart...
And she is good at sports.
Not only that, her family's amazing, too.
Apparently, Umaru-chan's dad is the president of Doma Corporation.
So that is why she is so graceful.
there cannot be anyone who would hate her.
Oh, but there is one person who seems to hate her.
You know, the other girl in our class.
I guess she does stare at Umaru-chan all the time.
Motoba-san has such sharp eyes, and she hardly ever talks.
You never know what she is thinking.
I heard she got in a serious fight with an older guy, too.
I wonder if Motoba-san wants to say something to me.
Actually, she seemed to want to say something
K-Kirie-chan's been staring at you for a while, Umaru-chan.
Lately, in particular, she is been doing it every day.
Oh, are you friends with Motoba-san, Ebina-chan?
But there was one time I invited her to eat lunch with us.
So after you told her I would be there...
I do not think that is why.
I do not know how to put it,
and everyone is scared of Kirie-chan, but...
I do not think she is scary.
I wonder why Motoba-san's been staring at me...
Maybe she is suspicious of me.
She would probably be pretty shocked if she saw me like this.
You are not like you are at school!
Let us get on these and play.
There is a new quest out today!
This is not the time to be worrying about reality.
You got a giant piece of meat!
I wonder when Onii-chan's going to be home.
Today's Wednesday, so he will be shopping for groceries.
Which means he will bring home some meat, too.
I wonder if he will make me steak.
Onii-chan went shopping, so he cannot open the door.
I-I ended up letting her in.
I wonder why she came over...
I did not even introduce myself.
YOU-Um, I apologize in advance if I am wrong, but...
I am her younger sister, Komaru.
No wonder you have a certain elegance, like Umaru-san.
I just created a pretty handy character.
S-So, it appears that Umaru-san is not here right now.
Around when will she be home?
Only Onii-chan and I live here.
Speaking of which, I wonder how she knew where I lived.
Why did you think Onee-chan was here, Kirie-chan?
For the past week, I have been following Umaru-san home.
I was supposed to give you this first,
or I would seem like some kind of stalker!
Regular Curriculum Name: Doma Umaru Birth date: 9/26 Enrolled: Heisei Year 27 April 1st
Oh, it is my student ID that I dropped.
YOU-Um... I picked that up a week ago.
I could not find the right time to give it back.
Everyone is scared of Kirie-chan, but...
I do not think she is scary.
I have just decided that I want to follow you, Master Komaru!
That makes me sound like a comic storyteller.
Umaru's wearing her hood in front of a friend.
Oh, it is nice to meet you.
She is so shy, she can only talk to children.
All right, I am going to spin a rare Gatcha, so come watch.
Do not lose to the other users!
Maybe if I talk to Master, I can be friends with Umaru-san...
Her eyes are as sharp as ever.
She is so scary, it is hard to approach her.
Thank you for always playing with my little sister!
Motoba-san, want to walk home together?
Oh, I always walk home with Ebina-chan.
We have talked to each other before, right?
Win 1 Million Yen Guess the Pork Cutlet Sauce!!
It was just getting good, too.
It is coming from the roof.
What are you going to do?
We are going to check it out, of course.
Do not scare me like tha
Umaru, you sure you do not want to turn on the lights?
This totally ruins the feel of the movie!
Well, I guess that is fine.
Were you always okay with scary movies?
I am not scared of ghosts at all!
Even if a ghost did appear,
I would take care of them with my footwork, like that!
But I heard the sequel's really good, so let us watch it.
Actually, I have got to go shopping.
You can watch it by yourself.
I guess it cannot be helped.
I will wait until you get back.
I guess it cannot be him.
I will watch some funny video, or something.
At least bring in the laundry at times like this.
The only person who could do this is Yashichi-san...
I thought you were not scared.
I have nothing more to teach you.
Playing master and student is fun!
